summary: Completed testing of iteration 9 features: Guest access to match details via /public endpoint, image upload functionality, SMTP test endpoint with config details, cron scheduler (APScheduler) startup verified, games/sub-games system, and team tournament history. All new features working correctly. Backend tests: 12/13 passed (1 skipped). Frontend features verified via Playwright.
passed_tests: GET /api/matches/{match_id}/public - Returns match details without authentication (guest access)
Public match endpoint returns tournament, match, team registrations, map_veto, schedule, context
POST /api/upload/image - Successfully uploads PNG, returns URL
POST /api/admin/smtp-test - Returns detailed config status (host, port, user, ssl settings)
GET /api/games - Returns games with sub_games and maps structure
APScheduler cron job starts on backend startup (daily_reminder_job at 10:00 UTC)
GamesPage shows 14 Spiele, 7 Versionen, 34 Maps with category filters
GamesPage admin view shows + Spiel hinzufügen, edit icons, + Version hinzufügen
GamesPage expanded view shows sub-games with map counts (Black Ops 6: 8 Maps, etc.)
CreateTournamentPage shows game selection, mode buttons (1v1-5v5), Unterspiel/Version selector
TeamDetailPage shows Übersicht, Mitglieder, Sub-Teams, Turniere tabs
MatchDetailPage works for guests via /tournaments/{id}/matches/{matchId} route using /public API fallback
MatchDetailPage shows TERMINABSTIMMUNG, MAP VETO, MATCH SETUP, ERGEBNIS sections

success_rate.backend: 92% (12/13 tests passed, 1 skipped - no teams for tournament history)

context_for_next_testing_agent: All iteration 9 features working: Public match endpoint for guests (/api/matches/{id}/public), image upload (/api/upload/image returns URL, /api/uploads/{filename} serves files), SMTP test (/api/admin/smtp-test returns config details), cron scheduler (APScheduler logs on startup), map-veto includes map_names lookup. GamesPage at /games shows full sub-games/maps hierarchy. CreateTournamentPage has working sub-game/version selection. TeamDetailPage has Turniere tab for tournament history. MatchDetailPage accessible to guests via /tournaments/{id}/matches/{matchId} using /public fallback.

verified_features.guest_match_access: Working - GET /api/matches/{id}/public returns full match data without auth
verified_features.image_upload: Working - POST /api/upload/image creates file, GET /api/uploads/{filename} serves it
verified_features.smtp_test: Working - Returns detailed config status (host, port, user, ssl, starttls)
verified_features.cron_scheduler: Working - APScheduler starts with daily_reminder_job at 10:00 UTC
verified_features.map_veto_map_names: Working - map_names lookup included in response
verified_features.sub_games_maps: Working - Full CRUD for sub-games and maps
